title: Artificial Intelligence in Web Development
author: John Doe
summary: How AI is revolutionizing the way we write code and build web applications.
content:
AI is no longer just a buzzword; it's a fundamental shift in how software is created. Tools like Copilot and specialized LLMs are now integrated into every developer's workflow.

## Automated Code Generation
Modern AI agents can now handle boilerplate code, unit testing, and even complex bug fixes with surprising accuracy. This allows humans to focus on higher-level architecture and creative problem solving.

## Personalized User Experiences
Beyond coding, AI allows us to build interfaces that adapt to user behavior in real-time, creating truly personalized web experiences that were previously impossible.
